saleValue - Variable in class gamecore.item.AbstractItem
 
saleValue - Variable in class gamecore.item.Material
 
setCombatTags(CombatTag...) - Method in class gamecore.item.ItemBuilder
If the item is to be used in combat, it should include combat tags.
setInventory(Inventory) - Method in class gamecore.entity.EntityBuilder
Be default, each new Entity will be provided with an empty Inventory appropriate to their stats.
setItemRarity(Rarity) - Method in class gamecore.item.ItemBuilder
By default, an item will be set to Rarity.COMMON.
setName(String) - Method in class gamecore.item.ItemBuilder
Just in case you wish to re-use an ItemBuilder to create a new item (that is similar to one already created, or else a new ItemBuilder should be used), a Name setter has been provided.
setPotency(int) - Method in class gamecore.item.ItemBuilder
Sets the potency for the new item.
setPotionType(PotionType) - Method in class gamecore.item.ItemBuilder
By default, potions will be set to BasicPotionType.HEALTH.
setSaleDifficulty(int) - Method in class gamecore.item.ItemBuilder
By default, an item has a saleDifficulty of 50 (neither difficult or hard to sell).
setSaleValue(int) - Method in class gamecore.item.ItemBuilder
By default, an item is worth 10 gold.
setSalt(int) - Method in class gamecore.entity.EntityBuilder
The Salt is used to make each individual Entity unique.
setSalt(int) - Method in class gamecore.item.ItemBuilder
This setter is intended for use on loading a saved state.
setStatMap(Map<Attribute, Integer>) - Method in class gamecore.entity.EntityBuilder
By default, stats will be determined at random.
setType(ItemType) - Method in class gamecore.item.ItemBuilder
In case an instance of ItemBuilder is to be re-used to create a new item (that is similar to one already created, or else a new ItemBuilder should be created), an ItemType setter has been provided.
setUseTag(UseTag) - Method in class gamecore.item.ItemBuilder
By default usable items are set to USABLE_OUT_OF_COMBAT.
setWeapon(Weapon) - Method in class gamecore.entity.EntityBuilder
By default, a new Entity will be equipped with a basic, 1-power Dexterity weapon.
setWeaponType(WeaponType) - Method in class gamecore.item.ItemBuilder
By default, weapons will be set to BasicWeaponType.SWORD.
setWeight(int) - Method in class gamecore.item.ItemBuilder
Sets the weight of the new item.
stackable - Variable in class gamecore.item.AbstractItem
 
statsNotRandom() - Method in class gamecore.entity.EntityBuilder
stats are usually determined at random upon Entity creation.
statsToBuff(Attribute...) - Method in class gamecore.entity.EntityBuilder
If one or more stats should be slightly higher then the others when they are generated, invoke this method and pass them through.
statsToNerf(Attribute...) - Method in class gamecore.entity.EntityBuilder
If one or more stats should be slightly lower then the others when they are generated, invoke this method and pass them through.
successfullyHits(RoundInfoContainer) - Method in class gamecore.entity.Entity
